name: Banana Boy and the Interdimensional Crusade
name_original: Banana Boy and the Interdimensional Crusade
description:
After the evil Hungry Jack defeats the Fruit Resistance and obtains the Blue Banana (a device that can create portals to different universes) in order to eradicate all fruit in every dimension, there seems to be no hope and no one in place to stop him. 

Will anyone be able to avenge the defeated fruit resistance and bring justice to junk food?
